Title: A Keg-Stamped Package
Description:
<A note, attached to a small and crumpled package, is shoved into your hands by a nondescript figure. Just as quickly, they disappear into the crowd. The letters on the note are scrawled crudely, as if by a dagger dipped in ink.>

Here's yer share of the plunder.

Sent the mates to the inn.

<You look around to see if there is anything else on the note. There is a picture of a keg at the bottom.

You shake the package gently and hear the telltale sound of coins.>
ObjectivesText: Bring the Keg-Stamped Note to Da'kash Grimledger at the Roasted Ram Inn in Valdrakken.
